item.title: New poll finds about half of rural young people feel job market pressures in their hometowns
item.description: A new poll from Gallup and the Walton Family Foundation found nearly half of rural Americans do not believe they can find work at home.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Inside Republicans' long game to confirm Trump FBI Director Kash Patel
item.description: Trump FBI Director Kash Patel's confirmation was the result of a significant and long-term effort to get senators' support.
